name: Marking Public Affairs bvba
goal: To offer strategic advice to health and social affairs stakeholders with the aim to put or keep their issues on the EU policy agenda and support the implementation of these public affairs strategies
interests: Budget, Consumer Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, Food Safety, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
- EU Health Programme
- Social Innovation Package
- Social OMC
- Horizon 2020
- Pharmaceutical policy and legislation (personalised medicines, biosimilars, natural medicine, homeopathy)
- AHA-EIP
- JA CHRODIS
- health inequalities
- Patient Safety
- EAsI
- EU Mental Health Compass
- Social Protection Committee
- European Semester
- Social Pillar
